website_summaries.verdict: This light down jacket is perfect for mild winter weather and travel.
pros: Contains 650-fill down but doesn’t look bulky or feel heavy
Items are kept secure in the pockets because they close with zippers
cons: On the small side for the size, which can be fixed by ordering a size larger

customer_reviews.title: Rip off! Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is not down filled as advertised. It is a cheap knock off that was not sold as such, avoid buying this product. It is a waste of money and doesn't even compare to identical real thing. Wife won't even wear it because it looks so cheap with its fake silk screened "Columbia" logo. It is one thing to sell cheap knock offs, it should be criminal to sell them as the real thing!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure if I was sold a fake jacket ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I was sold a fake jacket or not. There's a Columbia tag on the inside of the jacket, but no Columbia stitching on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for a larger chest
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket, the quality, the color, and the weight. Now if only it fit! I'm 5'2, 130ish lbs and ordered a Small based on size charts. While the body and arms fit well it was SUPER tight across the chest. Definitely not designed for someone with a C cup or larger. Sadly it had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: RobGP

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your time! This is the first product review I've ever written, and this jacket is honestly quite terrible. Ordered it hoping to use it for an upcoming hiking trip, and I am very disappointed. Can't send this one back fast enough. 1. feels very cheap, finish feels like a crinkly tarp, not breathable like other down jackets 2. runs small- very tight in hips and long in arms (ordered a size small, 5'6" 120 lbs) 3. Columbia logo appears screen-printed and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice coat
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of this jacket. I wore it during my whole trip to Iceland and it kept me pretty warm in 40-50 degree weather. I wouldn't recommend this as your only layer though, since its more of a fall/beginning winter coat. It's waterproof and lightweight. I also liked that it could be easily packed when rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket! Beautiful jewel tone blue! It is definitely a lightweight down jacket, but for southern California, it is plenty warm. I doubt it would be warm enough for December or January skiing, but should be fine for spring skiing. I can probably add a light fleece pullover under it for additional warmth. Doubt I'll need that tho. I ordered an XL so I can add layers if I need to.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this jacket
customer_reviews.text: It fits just a little tight but great quality and the color is exact. I bought this jacket to replace my old one and am very pleased. It is lightweight and great for layering. It also will roll up very small for easy packing. It's great for hiking, it keeps me warm and if there is rain my rain cover fits fine over it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this Jacket. Not sure what I was expecting for this price. If you like mountain hardware or Patagonia you will hate this jacket. It looks cheep, the fabric is like plastic or vinyl not the light weight nylon. This would not be good for shoving into small places like a backpack where weight and room considerations are essential.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: BOO! A scary bad jacket, DON’T buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for fall of 2018, put it away for winter and pulled it out for fall of 2019. While sitting in my closet the “c” and “u” have fallen off, seems like there should be a joke in there somewhere...anywho. DON’T BUY. Save YOUR MONEY! Columbia fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight packable jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. It's great for my outdoor activities! I feel absolutely no wind or cold coming through and the jacket is so light! I wear it to walk on chilly mornings but it is so stylish I will wear it with cute sweaters and boots as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and packable; very water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very comfy and warm. I wore it camping on a rainy day in October and was very cozy. Runs a tiny bit small, but otherwise is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I bought the jacket because I really love ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought the jacket because I really love Colambia! I expected more thick but that's not thick. If will be very cold I think this jacket won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Goodman

customer_reviews.title: very upset at this order. Below one star!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for Christmas presents in October. When I got them I put them away for Christmas, when they were opened to wrap I found they were a cheap knock off of a columbia jacket not down filled, and one had a hole in the front of the jacket. And when I tried to return them Amazon would not except a return because I bought them in October. I just got stung!!!!!! Not happy and no one to call about this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque hayes

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I completely understand when previous reviews call this jacket a possible fake. It feels like plastic and it is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: ravepurpledust

customer_reviews.title: Way to small..maybe kids sizing
customer_reviews.text: I always wear size M in Columbia jackets and they fit perfect but this one is not even close to M..and its actually size L..so, extremely small. Go 2 sizes up
customer_reviews.author: zee

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: This was a very flimsy jacket - I actually sent it back. There is no way it would have been appropriate for a cold Iowa win!
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Gray

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY
customer_reviews.text: LOVED THE COLOR. HAD TO SEND IT BACK BECAUSE IT WAS TOO TIGHT AROUND THE SHOULDERS. NEEDED TO ORDER A BIGGER SIZE, WHICH THEY DIDN'T HAVE AT THE TIME. SO I HAD TO GO WITH SOMETHING ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: Slbwick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to keep you warm!
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these myself. I purchased this one for my Sister. They make Great packable light weight jackets good down to about 35 degrees with minimal layering
customer_reviews.author: Roguesoldier13

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't look like the Michelin woman ... keeps me warm !!
customer_reviews.author: LLG

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight which is perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people said it fits small. I bought a medium which is the right size given I wear a 28 in jeans. Fits perfectly. Very lightweight which is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wears it all the time. She loves it. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Narrow in the hips
customer_reviews.text: This jacket did not fit like my Columbia 6500.. too narrow in the hips, I could get it zipped but it rode up. Forget putting anything in the pockets like a cell phone. I liked the color but had to return it. I am a 6/8 in the hips.
customer_reviews.author: janis k randazzo

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect jacket for fall and not so chilly winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is thin and lightweight. I wasn't sure if it would keep me warm enough but it really does! Great jacket & folds up for easy carry/packing too.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: Cool jacket
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit color was a little different from the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kijuana Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket large in sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket large in sleeves, but on the small size in hips, I am 5'7", 126lbs. Needs improvement, but I kept it, I like crisp white color.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great winter coat for chilly weather!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! Perfect for chilly weather without being too heavy! Also very stylish and goes with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: hc0098

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: expected so much more. it is not shinny as it look in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very warm
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits perfectly from the size chart. It keeps me warm on those very cold days as I wear it every day. It even has a detachable hood
customer_reviews.author: C. Hinman

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s a knockoff
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a medium size in Columbia jackets and this runs smaller than the usual. Also the Columbia logo is not sewn on like my other Columbia jackets. This emblem is a “iron on” of sorts. Has me wondering if it’s a knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Jacket
customer_reviews.text: It was a present for my wife...the jacket it's beautiful, great waist fit, very light weight, great for outdoors & camping.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Jackaman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lightweight puffer type jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably warm. Beautiful brown color. Fits perfectly. I bought 1 size up from usual so it would be comfortable under clothes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Strobach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This a super warm, super lightweight jacket. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Wright

customer_reviews.title: the fit is perfect. I got a medium but I am a ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous (the sea blue color), the fit is perfect. I got a medium but I am a size small, I like the bit of extra room and the length. It is very light weight, which I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Val B

customer_reviews.title: My favorite jacket!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite jacket!! I love that it keeps me warm without making me look 30 lb heavier than other winter jackets. Also great for going to and from the gym because outside fabric is cool (temperature wise).
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jacket. I took this on my summit climb ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome jacket. I took this on my summit climb up Mount Rainier. It kept me nice and toasty warm. I highly recommend it. I got a Large to fit over my base layer and two jackets. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: It’s thinner than I expected. And not warm at all. I nearly froze in 45 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Ledbetts88

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is what I expected, but the sleeves are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia mq

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size if busty
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight winter jacket. Love mine but can’t zip it up b/c too small when ordered in my normal size. Fits snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teen loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 16y/o and she loved it. Sized to fit, so if you wear sweatshirts/sweaters/thicker shirts, buy the next size up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fine
customer_reviews.text: This jacket fits wonderfully, I do not like the collar, however, its not bad enough to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I really love this jacket! Unfortunately it runs really small. I ordered a Medium. In Columbia a normal medium fits great or even is a little big. Had to return, size up on this one.
customer_reviews.author: hp

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Great for layering. Stayed warm in 30 degree weather. Not meant for colder than that. Fits snug but very flattering cut.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: My self
customer_reviews.text: Was not warm enough had to ware another jacket over it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Jacket was okay but size did not match size chart.
customer_reviews.author: salem buyer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jacket love the color
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jacket love the color.!! I wish I had gotten a bigger size. I think it runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Ellena Diane

customer_reviews.title: it's a fake product.  It is not a  Columbia Jacket
customer_reviews.text: It's a fake product. It is not a Columbia Jacket
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift and the price was excellent! Quality is topnotch.
customer_reviews.author: KCorson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Gave it to my daughter. It is meant for light weather.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Bees

customer_reviews.title: ... so had to return and order small but very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Fits large so had to return and order small but very nice!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price...the sizes are way off. You will need to go two sizes larger. Would not recomend buying unless you wear a small.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Biles

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, just not what I needed for the cold weather in my area.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Jacket fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the jacket. Size and color just as I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Randy S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife likes it a lot, only complaint she had it was not as warm as she expected.
customer_reviews.author: Swarmy

customer_reviews.title: Nice thin and cute but size ran very small and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice thin and cute but size ran very small and snug! I can wear a small and MED is usually loose on me! Had to return but would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Acps

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife was excited to receive jacket. Couldn't wait to unwrap it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AIH rider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best you can get , love amazon and definitely love Columbia !!!
customer_reviews.author: ambus

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice but fit was not comfortable and material very shiny.
customer_reviews.author: nora yaldizcyan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Warm and lightweight. I've received so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket for chilly morning walks. It's tailored to make one look slim. I get many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Greene

customer_reviews.title: Not Warm
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes it, and says it's comfortable, but man is this thing thin. It does not keep her warm below 40 degrees or so. You could not wear this in the winter for outdoor activities. It's more for spring or fall.
customer_reviews.author: T. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The jacket seems made for tall, thin and flat-chested ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket seems made for tall, thin and flat-chested women. I ordered the small size, which is my normal size - yet this jacket was longer than usual, coming down to the hips with long arms - yet I could barely zip it up past my chest. If it is sized so tight around the chest, shouldn't the length be accordingly not so long?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking jacket but very strange fit
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this--I ordered two sizes to make sure one fit but they were both tight in the body and had sleeves that were about 4" too long. Nice looking jacket but very strange fit. I'm 5'5 and 105 pounds and neither the small or xs worked. I have long arms so I'm not sure who those sleeves are meant for. Disappointing because I usually love Columbia stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Betadog

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit as advertised , arms to long, body to long and to tight
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved everything about this jacket
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this jacket, except the material. It's shiny black; very plastic-y looking - like a garbage bag. Bummed, but it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small compared to other styles.
customer_reviews.text: This style runs small. I have another Columbia jacket in x-small that fits fine, this was significantly smaller. The material is interesting, feels much thicker and sturdy than other down jackets I have.
customer_reviews.author: koko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, fit and excellent tailoring. It is well-made to hold up under active movement.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Mundorff

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what expected
customer_reviews.text: Columbia has 4 tipes of fit. This jacket is Active fit and its body skimming. Size S (thih size I have acc to Columbia size guide) fits great on my bwh 90/65/92cm. But if Columbia item is Regular fit (or Modern classic) I usually take size XS because S seams too big on me
customer_reviews.author: Olena Kyiv

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think it would be so warm because it's so light! Love it! You can literally pack it your luggage without worrying about the bulk. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ladtee

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it, but it is a little lighter weight than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Teague

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, nice and light.
customer_reviews.text: My girl friend loves this jacket. Her teenaged daughter keeps stealing it and wearing it to school. Really nice warm jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D. Menendez

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Performs as advertised. Christmas present for my wife. She loves it. Warm, fanshionable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My wife just loves this jacket I bought for her.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fit is off and the blue fabric from the inside shows through little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Russell M

customer_reviews.title: Too small. Must be Chinese sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"10" 165 lbs. I bought an xl according to sizing requirements. Too small. Especially in the shoulders. Cant wear anything under and cant move my arms to drive. I'm surprised by Columbia. I'll look at Northface now. Otherwise, I liked the look. Very lightweight though.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits very small. Great for shopping in and out of stores
customer_reviews.author: Becky Tocol

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, light weight, can wear alone on cold days or wear layers underneath for those really cold days (under 40).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This item had to be returned because it had dog hair all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extra large is a large but the color is cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lowther

customer_reviews.title: Not to try, try, again!
customer_reviews.text: I always order medium size as I am 5' and 125 #. The jacket was fine in sleeve length and length, but came 2 inches on either side of the zipper from closing when I put it on. I saw that it was made in Vietnam where people are smaller than here, and possibly that was the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Lessner

customer_reviews.title: Light and warm coat!
customer_reviews.text: Really light and keep you warm, I will buy again. I wear Medium and ordered L size which fits but if you want little loose to wear sweater than order XL.
customer_reviews.author: Kim G.

product_meta.title: Columbia Women's Flash Forward Down Jacket
feature_bullets: Binding at cuffs Bonded baffle construction
Shell: 100% Polyester Taffeta. Lining: 100% Polyester. Insulation: 100% 650 Fill Power Down
